description: Triangular array giving Ramanujan sum T(n,k) = c_n(k), for n >= 1, 1<=k<=n, where c_k(n) = Sum_{m=1..k, (m,k)=1} exp(2 Pi i m n / k).
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, page 160.
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=1..50 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: c[k_, n_] := Sum[ If[GCD[m, k] == 1, Exp[2 Pi*I*m*n/k], 0], {m, 1, k}]; A054533 = Flatten[ Table[c[n, k] // FullSimplify, {n, 1, 14}, {k, 1, n}] ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 27 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 09 2000
